name: Heckin' Schmeckin' (Post-Ludum)
description:
Kill endless waves of heck monster in this game!

Every 10 seconds a pickup (present) spawns, but beware since it can upgrade you or your enemies.

Originally made for Ludum Dare 51 Compo in less than 48 hours. Now updated with an online leaderboard and some other stuff!

Source code for this game is available.
